author: adityapatwardhan
body:
The published help content filename is missing '.psm1', but the help still
works. The bug is in PlatyPS and needs to be fixed to re-enable this test.

comments.author: Francisco-Gamino
comments.body: Thanks @adityapatwardhan . Could you please add a work item to enable this later? Other than that, LGTM.

title: Disable help content test for Microsoft.Powershell.Archive module
